subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson had amassed 409 yards in two December meetings with Green Bay, but on Saturday the Packers held him to 99 yards to top Minnesota in an N.F.C. wild-card game.
snippet: Adrian Peterson had amassed 409 yards in two December meetings with Green Bay, but on Saturday the Packers held him to 99 yards to top Minnesota in an N.F.C. wild-card game.
